columns.text:
Jacuzzi Suite (25 sq.m) with balcony (30 sq.m) + Up to 2 guests + Upper level in hotel’s main building + Queen size bed + Bathroom with couple-sized rain shower and Jacuzzi tab.

Green like a lagoon in a cave, designed for those who want to hide away for a couple of days.‎  ‎The bathroom, dressed with green mosaic leads to the indoor atmospheric heated Jacuzzi nested in a deep domed cave.‎  ‎Light up the candles, relax, and let yourself enjoy the feeling.‎ Located in the upper level of the complex, Lagoon Suite has a nearly step less access.‎ The large terrace with the comfy sun loungers and wing chairs, allow you to have a stunning panoramic view to the volcano and sunset.‎  ‎Enjoy a romantic candlelight dinner under the stars and wish that this fairy tale will never end.‎
Up to 2 Guests/ Caldera View

sizes: col-md-12 p-0 three-col px-3 px-sm-0 animation--up

items.seo_title: Above Blue Villa | Rooms | Above Blue Suites
items.seo_description: The Above Blue Villa has a 130 sq.m interior with an outdoor private plunge pool and jacuzzi. There are 2 bathrooms. Up to 4 guests. Superb views. Book now!
